definition: vocational high school/abbr. for 技工學校|技工学校[ji4 gong1 xue2 xiao4]/abbr. for 技術學校|技术学校[ji4 shu4 xue2 xiao4]

sentences.english: Technical secondary school or relative degree in chemical engineering or equipment.
sentences.chinese: 具有化工或设备专业中专或技校相关学历。

sentences.english: It is thus wise for the Chinese government to increase investment in technical schools.
sentences.chinese: 因此，中国政府加大对职业技校的投资时明智之举。

sentences.english: Two-thirds of the available jobs will require post-secondary education.
sentences.chinese: 三分之二的空缺职位将需要中专技校以上的学历。

sentences.english: Secondary education is provided in grammar schools, vocational schools and art schools.
sentences.chinese: 中级教育是由文法学院，职业技校和艺术学院提供的。

sentences.english: When I studied in technical school, I attained pratical training in advertisement design.
sentences.chinese: 读技校时，我受过广告设计方面的实用培训。

sentences.english: Third, the social development creates opportunities of further study for technical schools students.
sentences.chinese: 社会发展为技校生创造的升学机会。

sentences.english: The technical school trains mechanicians, welders, shop assistants, seamstresses and hairdressers.
sentences.chinese: 技校培养机修工，焊工，店员，裁缝和理发师。

sentences.english: Many vocational schools offer career training specifically designed for travel agents.
sentences.chinese: 很多职业技校都提供为旅行社特别设计的培训。

sentences.english: I have heard the sound technical Howard may have in this regard the teaching content.
sentences.chinese: 我听说过华音技校可能有这方面的教学内容。

sentences.english: Could be a hand-on learning centre or technical school.
sentences.chinese: 能成为一个手头上的一些学习中心或技校。

definition: vocational high school/abbr. to 技校[ji4 xiao4]
vocational high school (abbr. for 職業高中|职业高中[zhi2 ye4 gao1 zhong1])
vocational secondary school/technical secondary school/trade school/abbr. for 中等專科學校|中等专科学校
vocational high school/abbr. to 技校[ji4 xiao4]
vocational high school (abbr. to 職高|职高[zhi2 gao1])
technical school/abbr. for 工業學校|工业学校[gong1 ye4 xue2 xiao4]
secondary normal school (abbr. for 中等師範學校|中等师范学校[zhong1 deng3 shi1 fan4 xue2 xiao4])
college for people who attend after work
